title: 27 Beach Wedding Guest Dresses For Seaside Celebrations
description: If one of the celebrations on your summer social calendar is set on (or overlooking) the sand, you’ll need a beach wedding guest dress. Say, a nautical midi for coastal New England “I do’s,” a sunset-colored mini for a Caribbean soirée, or a linen maxi for a European affair.To help you prep for every kind of seaside occasion, we’ve curated a lineup of breezy, resort-y, romance-ready designs — from casual printed sundresses to elevated silhouettes with beautiful detailing. You’ll find flirty minis, versatile midis, and flowy maxis in bright colors, tropical prints, and breathable fabrics. The best part? Every pick in this stunning summer dress selection can also be styled for other warm-weather plans, like graduation ceremonies, vacations, or bachelorette parties. Just grab your favorite straw bag and sandals, then focus on the important part: celebrating the happy couple.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. author: Victoria Montalti
excerpt: We found the best beach wedding guest dresses in a range of styles, colors, and fabrics to celebrate upcoming summer weddings.

html:
Photo: Courtesy of Never Fully Dressed.

If one of the celebrations on your summer social calendar is set on (or overlooking) the sand, you’ll need a beach wedding guest dress. Say, a nautical midi for coastal New England “I do’s,” a sunset-colored mini for a Caribbean soirée, or a linen maxi for a European affair.

To help you prep for every kind of seaside occasion, we’ve curated a lineup of breezy, resort-y, romance-ready designs — from casual printed sundresses to elevated silhouettes with beautiful detailing. You’ll find flirty minis, versatile midis, and flowy maxis in bright colors, tropical prints, and breathable fabrics.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

The best part? Every pick in this stunning summer dress selection can also be styled for other warm-weather plans, like graduation ceremonies, vacations, or bachelorette parties. Just grab your favorite straw bag and sandals, then focus on the important part: celebrating the happy couple.

All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.
